post.author: Kelly Lee
post.content:
CA-ON-Markham-Sr. Programmer

----------------------------------------------------------------------

  Our client, a dynamic merchandising company in Markham is currently seeking a Sr. Programmer for a three month contract. This special project requires an individual with 5 years + programming & coding experience specifically with the following: SQL Server, ASP.net, Visual Basic and Style Sheets. Please forward your resume via e-mail. Thank you for your interest in this position. Only selected candidates will be contacted. You must be a resident of Canada to qualify for this position.

----------------------------------------------------------------------
Additional Information
Salary: CAD 50,000.00 to CAD 65,000.00 per year
Position Type: Full Time, Temporary/Contract/Project  

----------------------------------------------------------------------
Contact Information
Pauline Saunders
pauline.saunders@adecco.com

675 Cochrane Drive, Suite 304
Markham Ontario
Ph: 905-474-9555
post.title: Sr. Programmer
